original_text: And Aaron shall offer his bullock of the sin offering, which is for himself, and make an atonement for himself, and for his house.
korean_text: 아론은 자기를 위한 속죄제의 수송아지를 드리되 자기와 집안을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: And Aaron shall offer his bullock
of the sin offering, which is for himself
and make an atonement for himself
